parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The function to be executed once the delay expires.

parameters.name: options.delay
parameters.description: Time in milliseconds before execution. If null, the timeout is disabled.

parameters.name: options.startOnMount
parameters.description: If true, the timer starts as soon as the component mounts. Default: true.

returnValues.name: cancel
returnValues.description: Clears the pending timeout and sets isActive to false.

returnValues.name: isActive
returnValues.description: A reactive boolean indicating if a timer is currently counting down.

returnValues.name: reset
returnValues.description: Cancels any current timer and starts a fresh one from zero.
